website_summaries.verdict: Take your skateboarding activity to the next level with the Emerica Wino G6 Mid. The first mid-top in the Wino G6 collection, it is packed with materials that can provide better impact protection, superior cushioning, comfort, and excellent grip. Also, aside from functionality, it also offers a minimalist design yet exudes an elegance that can match a variety of outfits.
pros: According to most reviewers who are impressed with the design of the Emerica Wino G6 Mid, they described it as a "nice," "amazing," "stylish," and "simple yet elegant" shoe
Like other Emerica and Etnies skate shoes, it is a comfortable sneaker as attested by many users
Several customers are satisfied with how good the quality of the Wino G6 Mid
It is durable enough to hold up around the kickflip area
It provides an excellent fit like the Vans Classics, mentioned by a few
One said that it offers good ankle protection
Some purchasers agreed that is an excellent skate sneaker at a pocket-friendly rate
This mid-top shoe has a G6 PU insole that is appreciated by a couple of skateboarders
cons: A couple of wearers pointed out that the Emerica Wino G6 Mid runs a tad larger than expected
The shoe color is not as bright as those on the picture, muttered by a couple of commenters

customer_reviews.title: Emerica nailed it.
customer_reviews.text: Emerica upped the wino G6 low with a midtop version. And it doesn't disappoint. Ankle support/protection is always a good thing. Also fit as expected. I'm an 8.5 in Van's classics. These fit the same. I haven't skated or worn the regular wino low's so I can't really compare, but these are a quality and sturdy shoe. I don't think their too stiff or thick in the fixing tape at all. I've skated the huf hopper and that has a thick fixing tape feel. Emerica doesn't make bad shoes in my opinion and they are committed to making the real deal when it comes to skate shoes. And NO I was not paid to do this review.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Fassnacht

customer_reviews.title: Perfect..2nd time around!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect. First shoe arrived in time for Christmas, but recipient listed the wrong color on his gift list. Returned & reordered desired color, which came sooner than expected...all is well. Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: bjmasten

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic feel and look
customer_reviews.text: I got the tan/black version. I've had many shoes from Emerica, and these have to be my favorites so far. They're really nice and the quality you expect from Emerica.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable from the get-go.
customer_reviews.text: I had only been buying Fallen brand shoes online, as I knew they would fit without needing to try them on, but I decided to get these instead. Off the bat I noticed that Id be able to save my ankles from the usual abrasion that accompanies breaking in low-cut skate shoes. These are soft on the inside and durable on the outside. They might feel too hot for the summer, but they're mad comfortable in colder weather. Been wearing them essentially every day since I got 'em with no problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Wino G6
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe,fits well.Will even wear them with dress cloths.I like the tan so much I bought the grey also.I hope to find a coupon,I have my eye on a different style.Thanks Mike
customer_reviews.author: Amazbuckeyemikeon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped broken and won't allow me to return.
customer_reviews.text: The glue holding the sole to the shoe was garbage. I messaged TGM Skateboards with pictures and they said, 'not our fault-- contact the manufacturer', yeah right-- that would likely take hours of messy emails/phonecalls with Emerica. 65 bucks down the drain, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first couple weeks was fine but it smells bad after wearing it  all da
customer_reviews.text: It fits me perfectly, But the problem it smells after a couple weeks. Like you can’t wear all day. However, I do have other items that I bought from Amazon and it doesn’t smell. They’re good.
customer_reviews.author: imad marjia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe except the fitment.
customer_reviews.text: I usually used size 7 shoes but at this time the shoe was a littlel bit large to me. It's like 7.5 on my feet, but its indicated that it is US 7.
customer_reviews.author: Rowyn Mañego

customer_reviews.title: damaged right out the box
customer_reviews.text: didn’t try them on because i saw these are damaged right out the box...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Look good but do not feel great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not that comfortable, the high ankle digs into my leg. They look good though.
customer_reviews.author: Dependable Review

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great style and a good fit. Bonus: it flips super well on the toe side and heel side.
customer_reviews.author: David Judah

product_meta.title: Emerica Men's Wino G6 Mid Skate Shoe, Black/White/Gold, 8.5 Medium US
product_meta.description: The Wino G6 Mid builds upon the original Wino style by adding durability and delivering a one of a kind skateable hybrid to the Emerica line.You wanted a skateable Wino and now you've got one.Skateboard Shoe. Lth Upper. Rub Sole. Cover Ankle.
